Subject: Assistance with a CAP Use Case - Block Screenshots on a Specific Website
Description:
Hey EPP,

We are trying to configure a CAP that will do the following but can’t seem to figure it out. Hoping you can provide some assistance.

Use Case: We have a specific website that contains sensitive information. We want to block all print screens/screenshots on this website without impacting other print screen/screenshot activities.

Is there a way we can do this? FYI – we’ve tried using OCR but have found it to be unreliable.

OS: Windows
Server: 5.9.3
Agent: 6.2.2.1

Thanks,
Solution_Comment__c: No further feedback from the customer.
